title: Man's wrap
description: red and black striped wrap with wide center section which is embroidered; red and black area has wide red stripes with narrow black stripes and then areas that are vice versa; center section has embroidered animals, abstract and geometric designs; animals include tiger, lion, water buffalos, elephants and roosters; fringe at short ends
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
